properties.originatingSystemName: Greater Palm Springs Multiple Listing Service
properties.publicRemarks:
Tired of the search for the perfect house? Picture this: a canvas of opportunity awaits on this inviting
 downslope lot, offering stunning vistas of the serene Lake Gregory and the captivating twinkling city
 lights of the high desert. If you can't find your dream home, why not craft it yourself? This enticing lot
 is situated at the end of a tranquil dead-end street, promising a quiet haven where the only commotion
 you'll encounter is the gentle rustling of local wildlife. Imagine waking up to the soft melodies of
 nature, a symphony tailored exclusively for you. With 50 feet of frontage along a well-paved and
 meticulously maintained road, accessibility is seamless. The location, nestled between 668 Chillon and
 725 Chillon, offers a sense of community while still affording you the privacy and space you crave.
 Survey the panoramic expanse before you - the blue waters of Lake Gregory glistening beneath the
 sun's embrace, and as twilight descends, the high desert city lights illuminate the horizon like a sea of
 stars. This vacant lot represents more than just raw land - it embodies the potential to shape the life
 you've envisioned. A dream home, carefully tailored to your preferences, rises from the ground up.
 This is your chance to turn imagination into reality. Consider the untapped possibilities, the unwritten
 chapters that lie before you. Let your aspirations take flight as you contemplate the home that you
 alone will create, and the legacy that will be yours to
properties.sourceSystemName: Greater Palm Springs Multiple Listing Service
properties.view: City Lights, Desert, Lake, Mountain(s), Trees/Woods
